item.description:
Hi Folks,

I'm interested in one more ice climb for the season on Sunday, Mar 13 (except for Huntington).  Not clear where we'll head out to because conditions are changing.  We'll meet up in Crawford Notch, and decide where to go based on reports and tips from other climbers, and what we see.

Please bring your climbing gear, warm clothes and snacks, including belay device, biners, ropes, ice screws, webbing, harness, helmet, axes, crampons, balaclava, gloves+mittens+heat packs, etc. We'll meet up at the Highland Center, at 8 AM. Let me know if you are a beginner, so I can advise you on what to bring.

Ken D.
item.name: Ice climbing--going, going, ....
